snippet: Stock market indexes rose as a rally in the dollar waned and financial companies rose after a number of banks got approval to raise dividends and buy back shares.
abstract: Stock market climbs to its highest level in five weeks, spurred by rally in the dollar.
lead_paragraph: Stock market indexes rose as a rally in the dollar waned and financial companies rose after a number of banks got approval to raise dividends and buy back shares.

headline.main: Market Rises, With the Financial Sector Leading the Way
headline.print_headline: Dollar Slips, and Market Has Its Best Day in 5 Weeks
